data.text: “An bende mor ma kamano
Lingʼuru kendo uwinj dwond Nyasaye kaka mor ka polo,
En emomiyo mil polo menyo kor polo duto,
Bangʼ mano iwinjo dwonde ka mor matek
Dwond Nyasaye mor e yo miwuoro;
Owacho ne pe ni, ‘Lwar piny,’
Otimo kamano mondo ji duto mane ochweyo,
Le ringo pondo;
Ahiti biro koa kuma opandee,
Much Nyasaye kelo pe
Opongʼo boche polo gi ngʼich mar pi
Gilwore mana kaka Nyasaye dwaro,
Ndalo moko Nyasaye kelo rumbi e piny mondo okumgo ji,
“Winjie wachni, Ayub;
Bende ingʼeyo kaka Nyasaye chiko boche polo
Bende ingʼeyo kaka boche oliero e kor polo,
To in ma kinde ma yamb milambo kudho mi two piny,
bende inyalo konye yaro polo,
“Nyiswa ane gima dwanyis Nyasaye machalo kamano
Bende en gima owinjore mondo onyise ka adwaro wuoyo?
Koro onge ngʼama nyalo rango wangʼ chiengʼ tir,
Nyasaye wuok koa yo nyandwat
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego oyombowa mabor
Mano emomiyo ji miye luor,
